actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the construction of a Center for National Security and Arms Control at Sandia National Laboratories in Albuquerque, New Mexico.
short_title: Center for National Security and Arms Control Authorization Act of 1989

summary.text: Center for National Security and Arms Control Authorization Act of 1989 - Authorizes the Secretary of Energy to establish, construct, and operate a Center for National Security and Arms Control at Sandia National Laboratories in Albuquerque, New Mexico. Transfers specified real property from the Department of Defense to the Department of Energy for use as such Center. Authorizes appropriations to the Department of Energy for FY 1990 for establishing such Center.

titles.title: Center for National Security and Arms Control Authorization Act of 1989
A bill to authorize the construction of a Center for National Security and Arms Control at Sandia National Laboratories in Albuquerque, New Mexico.
